Field Description: ID number of point dendrometer, as printed on the unit
Tag number, appearing on aluminum tag attached to each tree; also matches dendrometer to plot data, though treeID is more secure
Arbitrary numeric identifier for trees, identical to those used in the main plot database and useful for matching dendrometers to the plot data
Arbitrary numeric identifier for stems, identical to those used in the main plot database and useful for matching dendrometers to the plot data
Four-letter species mnemonic, matching that used in main plot database
Tree diameter as recorded in the 2018 plot census
Crown illumination index, as recorded in the 2021 mortality survey
Designation for 20x20 m quadrat, matching those used in main plot database
Year in which first dendrometer was installed on a tree and measurement record started
Month in which first dendrometer was installed on a tree and measurement record started
Day on which first dendroband was installed on a tree and measurements were first taken
Binary code (1=true, 0 = false) indicating whether we have a tree-ring record for the tree.
Notes on the tree and its data record
